headline: Chevron To Eliminate 200 Jobs In The Permian Basin, Bloomberg Reports
summary: Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is among the 13 Best Hydrogen and Fuel Cell Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. It has disclosed plans to lay off 200 people in the Permian Basin, revising the Texas Workforce Commission’s prior, inaccurate announcement of 800 layoffs. The company informed the commission and explained the disparity. These layoffs are a […]
